name: config
description: Retrieves or sets Angular configuration values in the angular.json file for the workspace.

options.name: json-path
options.description: The configuration key to set or query, in JSON path format. For example: "a[3].foo.bar[2]". If no new value is provided, returns the current value of this key.

options.name: global
options.description: Access the global configuration in the caller's home directory.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: value
options.description: If provided, a new value for the given configuration key.
